title.narrative: CSR Facility 2015: Danmarks Rederiforening. The MACN Port Efficiency and Integrity Project

description.narrative:
The strategic objective of the project is to fight corruption in the maritime sector. The project objective is to decrease corruption in key Nigerian ports through three core project components: 1. Transparency: Aligning procedures for port call between public and private parties in the Maritime Sector; 2. Policy: Establishing a standard framework for integrity at ports; and 3. Training: Establishing standard training for local public officials.
The project target Group are the public authorities working in the targetted Nigerian ports (component 1 and 2) and the employees working for these authorities, approx. 1000 employees (component 3). The Nigerian ports are Lagos, Tincan Island and Rivers Port Complexes. The project periode is 2015-17.
